content: SHANGHAI Chinese courier ZTO Express  and the underwriters of its New York stock market listing have been sued by a U.S. pension fund that alleges the firm exaggerated its profit margins to lure investors into its $1.4 billion initial public offering.
name: ZTO Express (Cayman) Inc
title: Chinese courier ZTO sued for 'untrue statements' in $1.4 billion U.S. IPO

content: SHANGHAI  July 21 Chinese courier ZTO Express and the underwriters of its New York stock market listing have been sued by a U.S. pension fund that alleges the firm exaggerated its profit margins to lure investors into its $1.4 billion initial public offering.
name: ZTO Express (Cayman) Inc
title: UPDATE 3-Chinese courier ZTO sued for 'untrue statements' in $1.4 bln U.S. IPO
